Vindictus.Sanyaa: The Lost Outsider:
lo, this is the Vindictus team.

Today we're introducing the [b]25th[/b] hero of Vindictus, [b]Sanyaa.[/b]

 

She is a female character who wields [b]Dual Knives[/b].

 

These are fast and precise weapons that target the weaknesses of her enemies and are a perfect match for her hand-to-hand skills. 

Utilizing combat resources that build up over the course of the fight, players will be able to experience dynamic gameplay.

As you dodge enemy attacks and successfully counterattack, certain moves become more powerful, and can turn the tide of battle in your favor.

She's a fun character to play, with quick attacks and deft dodges! 

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2024/q3/1367/sanyaa1.jpg[/img]

[b](Sanyaa with Dual Knives)[/b]

 
[list][*][b]Quickly dodge enemy attacks[/b][/*][/list]
Sanyaa is a character who specializes in dodging incoming attacks.

You have two basic dodges and can use [b]Egret Step[/b] to quickly dodge in emergencies.

 

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2024/q3/1368/sanyaa2.jpg[/img]

[b](Sanyaa dodging enemy attacks)[/b]

 
[list][*][b]Dodge and counterattack[/b][/*][/list]
Sanyaa can rapidly counter with a [b]Shadow Reprisal[/b] if she times her dodge.

If you successfully counter with [b]Shadow Reprisal[/b], you'll be in a [b]Playful[/b] state for a period of time.

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2024/q3/1369/sanyaa3.jpg[/img]

[b](Counterattacking Sanyaa)[/b]

 
[list][*][b]Playful[/b][/*][/list]
When Sanyaa is being Playful, her [b]Heron Step[/b] skill is enhanced to [b]Shadow Play[/b] to dance around her adversaries.  

In addition, her [b]Swift Slash[/b] skill is enhanced to [b]Play Rough[/b], which can turn the tide of battle in your favor. 

 

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2024/q3/1370/sanyaa4.jpg[/img]

[b](Sanyaa attacking with Play Rough)[/b]

 
[list][*][b]Sanyaa's quick approach and powerful skills[/b][/*][/list]
Sanyaa's [b]Active: Thief's Mark[/b] allows her to mark her enemies.

After marking them, re-entering an active skill during its duration will allow Sanyaa to quickly approach and attack the marked target.

 

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2024/q3/1371/sanyaa5.jpg[/img]

[b](Sanyaa approaching the marked target)[/b]

 

"[b]Active: Take Flight[/b]" is a skill that attacks enemies by spinning in midair.

From the moment you spin, you can change direction with the directional keys.

 

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2024/q3/1372/sanyaa6.jpg[/img]

 

Other moves include "[b]Active: Vanishing Dance[/b]," which lets you disappear for a moment and then attack, "[b]Active: Crescent Kick[/b
